law.history: Repealed 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 12, sec. 56, effective June 25, 2009. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 20, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 10, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1994. -- Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 423, sec. 3, effective July 13, 1990.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Office of the Taxpayer Ombudsman -- Qualifications and duties of tax ombudsman.
